name: Curry
directions: Throw everything into a big pot, simmer for like 6 hours.

name: Rum Ham
directions: Soak the ham in the rum. Eat while beligerent.

name: Hot Pockets
directions: Put hot pocket in microwave for 44 seconds. It should be molten on the outside and frozen on the inside. Consume in shame.

name: Brownies
directions: Just follow the directions on the box. It's really not that hard.
